requests.originalRequest: Implement full project launcher application with Electron, React, TypeScript, Zustand, IPC communication, and project management features
requests.splitDetails: Implement full project launcher application with Electron, React, TypeScript, Zustand, IPC communication, and project management features

tasks.title: Setup Electron App Structure
tasks.description: Create the main Electron application structure with proper configuration files, main process setup, and preload scripts for secure IPC communication
tasks.completedDetails:
Successfully set up enhanced Electron app structure with:
- Added dependencies: better-sqlite3, chokidar, fast-glob
- Created DatabaseService for managing projects, IDEs, and settings
- Created ProjectScannerService for detecting and monitoring projects
- Created IDELauncherService for detecting and launching IDEs
- Created comprehensive IPC handlers for project management
- Updated preload scripts to expose project manager API
- Enhanced main window configuration with better dimensions and security settings
- Integrated all services into the main IPC system

tasks.title: Implement React Frontend with TypeScript
tasks.description: Create the React application with TypeScript, setup component structure, routing, and basic UI layout for the project launcher

tasks.title: Setup Zustand State Management
tasks.description: Implement Zustand store for managing application state including projects, settings, and UI state

tasks.title: Create Project Management Logic
tasks.description: Implement core project management features including project detection, categorization, recent projects tracking, and project metadata handling

tasks.title: Implement IPC Communication
tasks.description: Setup secure IPC channels between main and renderer processes for project operations, file system access, and IDE launching

tasks.title: Design and Implement UI Components
tasks.description: Create modern, responsive UI components for project listing, search, filters, quick actions, and settings

tasks.title: Implement IDE Auto-Detection and Launching
tasks.description: Create logic to detect installed IDEs, configure launch parameters, and handle position replacement when launching IDEs

tasks.title: Add Database Integration
tasks.description: Integrate better-sqlite3 for persistent storage of project data, settings, and user preferences

tasks.title: Implement Project Templates and Starters
tasks.description: Add functionality for project templates, starter projects, and workspace management features

tasks.title: Testing and Polish
tasks.description: Add comprehensive testing, error handling, performance optimization, and final UI polish
